title: Version 0.86.0 Released
description: Added support for all GPT-5 models, Grok-4 via xai, Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite Preview, and OpenRouter Kimi K2. Improved /clear and /undo command output, fixed model settings replacement, and upgraded PostHog SDK. Aider wrote 88% of the code in this release.

title: Model Picker for GitHub Mobile
description: GitHub Mobile released a model picker feature for Copilot coding agent, available for Copilot Pro and Pro+ users. Enhanced symbol context finding tools for improved code understanding.

title: Version 0.85.0 Released
description: Added support for new Gemini 2.5 models (Pro, Flash, Pro Preview) with thinking tokens, Responses API models (o1-pro, o3-pro), and OpenAI o3-pro. Added --add-gitignore-files flag, enabled co-authored-by attribution by default, and added MATLAB and Clojure language support for repository maps.

title: File Reading Functionality Optimized
description: Major optimization of file reading functionality, improving experience from exception-prone to smooth operation. Integrated fixes into latest version with complete changelog available. Team plans further enhancements including binary file preview and incremental reading support.

title: Version 2.1.x Series Released
description: Major update with 1,096 commits including 80+ changes: Skills hot reload, multi-language response configuration, enhanced terminal compatibility, wildcard tool permissions, and agent behavior improvements. Patches security vulnerabilities related to sensitive data in debug logs.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code 2.1 发布：一口气更新了80多个功能特性
Claude Code上线Opus 4.6快速模式预览版 响应提速质量不变还享限时折扣
Best practice: Don't let it modify 7-8 files or write thousands of lines of code at once. Process 1-2 files or one clear function/module at a time → run tests → feedback bugs → iterate 2-4 rounds
Claude Code 2.1.20 introduced changes that hid code repository operation details, which reportedly caused some user dissatisfaction
Absolutely worth trying. The tool has advanced concepts and powerful functionality. Best for rapid prototyping and 'vibe coding'
Some developers switching from Cursor to Claude Code due to better code repository understanding, tool invocation, and context management
